Nurse: I'm glad to hear that you're feeling good about it. Most people say the procedure itself is no problem at all but the bowel prep can be a little bit tough. But we're here to support you every step of the way. Do you have any questions about the clear liquid diet or the GoLYTELY laxative solution?

Patient: [NO RESPONSE]

Nurse: That's perfectly fine.

Patient: I don't have any questions.

Nurse: Alright. You don't have to do anything just yet. But you'll need to start your bowel prep 24 hours before your procedure by drinking only clear liquids which involves no solid foods and drinking either clear or light colored beverages without any red or purple dye. Can I share some examples of what clear liquids are and you can tell me what questions you have about the diet?

Patient: It's okay. I got it. Thank you.

Nurse: You're welcome. Do you have any remaining questions about the diet changes?

Patient: No. I don't.

responses.gpt4: Alright. I'd like to move on to the bowel prep. The other main step to remember is drinking the laxative solution the night before your procedure. Would you like some tips to make drinking the laxative solution easier?
